languages.text: "Колония, захваченная этой мерзостью, не имела возможности поднять корабль на орбиту и отправиться на свершение новых злодейств. Все, что им оставалось — расставить западню на добросердечных подданных Императора. Или пиратов, которые решат ограбить "беззащитных паломников".

"The colony gripped by this foulness was unable to put a ship into orbit and set off to wreak new villainy. The only thing they could do is set a trap for good-hearted subjects of the Emperor. Or for pirates intending to rob the 'defenceless pilgrims.'"
languages.original_text: "Колония, захваченная этой мерзостью, не имела возможности поднять корабль на орбиту и отправиться на свершение новых злодейств. Все, что им оставалось — расставить западню на добросердечных подданных Императора. Или пиратов, которые решат ограбить "беззащитных паломников".

traits.locale_text: "The colony gripped by this foulness was unable to put a ship into orbit and set off to wreak new villainy. The only thing they could do is set a trap for good-hearted subjects of the Emperor. Or for pirates intending to rob the 'defenceless pilgrims.'"

"The colony gripped by this foulness was unable to put a ship into orbit and set off to wreak new villainy. The only thing they could do is set a trap for good-hearted subjects of the Emperor. Or for pirates intending to rob the 'defenceless pilgrims.'"

"The colony gripped by this foulness was unable to put a ship into orbit and set off to wreak new villainy. The only thing they could do is set a trap for good-hearted subjects of the Emperor. Or for pirates intending to rob the 'defenceless pilgrims.'"

"The colony gripped by this foulness was unable to put a ship into orbit and set off to wreak new villainy. The only thing they could do is set a trap for good-hearted subjects of the Emperor. Or for pirates intending to rob the 'defenceless pilgrims.'"

languages.text: “被这种生物感染的殖民地并没有办法将飞船射入轨道，散播感染。因此，感染生物唯一能做的事情，就是诱使帝皇的善良臣民落入陷阱之中，或是假扮成‘手无寸铁的朝圣者’，引诱海盗上钩。”
languages.original_text: "The colony gripped by this foulness was unable to put a ship into orbit and set off to wreak new villainy. The only thing they could do is set a trap for good-hearted subjects of the Emperor. Or for pirates intending to rob the 'defenceless pilgrims.'"

traits.locale_text: “被这种生物感染的殖民地并没有办法将飞船射入轨道，散播感染。因此，感染生物唯一能做的事情，就是诱使帝皇的善良臣民落入陷阱之中，或是假扮成‘手无寸铁的朝圣者’，引诱海盗上钩。”

languages.text: «La colonia atenazada por esta maldad fue incapaz de lanzar una sola nave al vacío para extender su vileza. Lo único que consiguió hacer fue preparar una trampa para los súbditos bienintencionados del Emperador... o para los piratas que pretendieran robar a unos "peregrinos indefensos"».
languages.original_text: "The colony gripped by this foulness was unable to put a ship into orbit and set off to wreak new villainy. The only thing they could do is set a trap for good-hearted subjects of the Emperor. Or for pirates intending to rob the 'defenceless pilgrims.'"

traits.locale_text: «La colonia atenazada por esta maldad fue incapaz de lanzar una sola nave al vacío para extender su vileza. Lo único que consiguió hacer fue preparar una trampa para los súbditos bienintencionados del Emperador... o para los piratas que pretendieran robar a unos "peregrinos indefensos"».

languages.text: "Die von diesem Übel erfasste Kolonie war nicht in der Lage, ein Schiff in den Orbit zu bringen und schickte sich an, neues Unheil zu stiften. Sie konnten nur noch den gutherzigen Untertanen des Imperators eine Falle stellen. Oder Piraten, die vorhaben, 'wehrlose Pilger' auszurauben."
languages.original_text: "The colony gripped by this foulness was unable to put a ship into orbit and set off to wreak new villainy. The only thing they could do is set a trap for good-hearted subjects of the Emperor. Or for pirates intending to rob the 'defenceless pilgrims.'"

traits.locale_text: "Die von diesem Übel erfasste Kolonie war nicht in der Lage, ein Schiff in den Orbit zu bringen und schickte sich an, neues Unheil zu stiften. Sie konnten nur noch den gutherzigen Untertanen des Imperators eine Falle stellen. Oder Piraten, die vorhaben, 'wehrlose Pilger' auszurauben."

languages.text: « La colonie victime de cette souillure s'est révélée incapable de mettre un vaisseau en orbite pour aller commettre de nouvelles infamies. La seule chose que ces monstres ont pu faire, c'est de tendre un piège aux loyaux et charitables sujets de l'Empereur... ou aux pirates espérant s'en prendre à des "pèlerins sans défense". »
languages.original_text: "The colony gripped by this foulness was unable to put a ship into orbit and set off to wreak new villainy. The only thing they could do is set a trap for good-hearted subjects of the Emperor. Or for pirates intending to rob the 'defenceless pilgrims.'"

traits.locale_text: « La colonie victime de cette souillure s'est révélée incapable de mettre un vaisseau en orbite pour aller commettre de nouvelles infamies. La seule chose que ces monstres ont pu faire, c'est de tendre un piège aux loyaux et charitables sujets de l'Empereur... ou aux pirates espérant s'en prendre à des "pèlerins sans défense". »

languages.text: 「この不届き者に捕まったコロニーは、船を軌道に乗せて、次の悪事を働きにでかけることができなかった。唯一できることは、皇帝の善良な家臣に罠を仕掛けることです。それか、無防備な巡礼者を略奪目的で襲う海賊も標的でしょう」
languages.original_text: "The colony gripped by this foulness was unable to put a ship into orbit and set off to wreak new villainy. The only thing they could do is set a trap for good-hearted subjects of the Emperor. Or for pirates intending to rob the 'defenceless pilgrims.'"

traits.locale_text: 「この不届き者に捕まったコロニーは、船を軌道に乗せて、次の悪事を働きにでかけることができなかった。唯一できることは、皇帝の善良な家臣に罠を仕掛けることです。それか、無防備な巡礼者を略奪目的で襲う海賊も標的でしょう」

languages.text: "Bu kötülüğün hedefi olmuş koloni, yörüngeye bir gemi çıkaramamış ve yola çıkıp yeni kötülüklere sebep olamamış. Yapabildikleri tek şey, İmparator'un iyi yürekli kullarına tuzak kurmak. Olmadı 'savunmasız hacıları' soyma niyetindeki korsanlara."
languages.original_text: "The colony gripped by this foulness was unable to put a ship into orbit and set off to wreak new villainy. The only thing they could do is set a trap for good-hearted subjects of the Emperor. Or for pirates intending to rob the 'defenceless pilgrims.'"
